legal.header: Why do we ask for your email and phone number?
message: We will use your email address and mobile phone number to manage your account access and furnish you with plan communications and notifications, such as enrollment confirmations, transaction status updates, and information about account features and services available to you. You can manage your mail delivery options in the communication preferences section of the participant website.
We are committed to respecting your privacy. To learn how we protect your personal information, please read our
